response: **If you are seeing an ``Invalid Session`` error when trying to log into Hypixel, try relogging into your Minecraft launcher. This issue is entirely on Mojang's side of things.**

NotEnoughCoins will not be added to SkyClient.
We will also not provide any support for NotEnoughCoins.
The same applies to all auction flipping mods.

**Reinstalling SkyClient may not fix your issue.** While a mod may fail to download, repeatedly reinstalling will just be putting the same mods in your mods folder.
Try to actually fix the issue instead of reinstalling for the 10th time.
Download SkyClient from <#780940408175853609>, or see the [forum post](<https://hypixel.net/threads/3731617/>)
Type /mcfolder in Discord, then go to the mods folder in that folder.
SkyClient installs Forge for you. You shouldn't need it pre-installed

First, go to your SkyClient folder. See this: https://youtu.be/BHIM2htfMk8

**`Exit Code 0:`**
Go into the `logs` folder and upload `latest.log`
If you don't see that file, look for it. Any other file will be useless.

**`Exit Code 1 (or anything other than 0):`**
Go into the crash-reports folder and upload the latest current crashlog.

Use OverflowAnimations, the most accurate 1.7 (and 1.15+) animations mod for 1.8. Download here: https://modrinth.com/mod/animations

If you want custom animations, use OverflowAnimations, the most accurate 1.7 (and 1.15+) animations mod for 1.8 which allows for both simple and advanced custom animations. Download here: https://modrinth.com/mod/animations

Set CTM to fast or off.
`escape` -> `options` -> `video settings` -> `quality` -> `Connected Textures: FAST or OFF`
Type /dungeonfps in Discord to see recommendations on how to fix lag in Dungeons

If you get a notification along the lines of "Unable to start Minecraft", this is an issue with the vanilla Minecraft launcher. We recommend switching to Modrinth or Prism Launcher instead: https://alternatives.microcontrollers.dev/launcher/home/

An announcement regarding the future of SkyClient for 1.21.x is coming soon, but there will be a replacement. For now, use [a modpack one of our admins created](https://modrinth.com/modpack/micros-skyblock-modpack).
